dct_alternative_sm: Potomac River from entrance to Piney Point
Potomac River from Piney Point to Lower Cedar Point
Potomac River from Lower Cedar Point to Indian head
Potomac River from Indian head to Georgetown
dct_description_sm: United States Coast Survey ; from a trigonometrical survey under the direction of A.D. Bache ; triangulation by J. Farley and C. Ferguson ; topography by R.D. Cutts ... [et al.] ; hydrography by the parties under the command of S.P. Lee and W.T. Muse.
Nautical chart of the Potomac River Estuary from Washington, D.C. to Chesapeake Bay.
Relief shown by hachures and landform drawings. Depths shown by soundings (in feet), isolines, and shading.
"Issued ... 1877 C.P. Patterson Superintendent. Verified J.E. Hilgard ..."

Sheet no. 4. From Indian Head to Georgetown / triangulation by A.D. Bache ... [et al.] ; hydrography by T.S. Phelps, C.P. Patterson, and C. Junken ; eng[rave]d by A. Maedel and A. Petersen ; red[uce]d dr[awi]ng by H. Lindenkohl and L. Karcher.
